headline.print_headline: 4 Years After Spill, Questions on Long-Term Health
headline.main: 4 Years After Spill, Questions on Long-Term Health

docs.lead_paragraph: When a BP oil well began gushing crude into the Gulf of Mexico four years ago, fisherman George Barisich used his boat to help clean up the millions of gallons that spewed in what would become the worst offshore spill in U.S. history.
docs.snippet: When a BP oil well began gushing crude into the Gulf of Mexico four years ago, fisherman George Barisich used his boat to help clean up the millions of gallons that spewed in what would become the worst offshore spill in U.S. history.
